Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.mobilesync.manager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LayoutSyncManager.LayoutSyncCallback
    Callback interface for layout sync.
    MetadataSyncManager.MetadataSyncCallback
    Callback interface for metadata sync.
    SyncManager.CleanResyncGhostsCallback
    Callback to get clean resync ghosts completion status
    SyncManager.SyncUpdateCallback
    Callback to get sync status udpates
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvancedSyncUpTask
    Runnable class responsible for running a sync up that uses and AdvancedSyncUpTarget
    CleanSyncGhostsTask
    Runnable class responsible for running clean sync ghosts operation
    LayoutSyncManager
    Provides an easy way to fetch layout data using LayoutSyncDownTarget.
    MetadataSyncManager
    Provides an easy way to fetch metadata using MetadataSyncDownTarget.
    SyncDownTask
    Runnable class responsible for running a sync down
    SyncManager
    Sync Manager
    SyncTask
    Abstract super class of runnable classes responsible for running syncs
    SyncUpTask
    Runnable class responsible for running a sync up
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SyncManager.State
    Enum for sync manager state
    SyncUpTask.Action
    Enum for action
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SyncManager.MobileSyncException
    Exception thrown by mobile sync manager
    SyncManager.SyncManagerStoppedException
    Exception thrown when sync manager is stopped
